sentences.en: A riding accident left him immobile.
sentences.cn: 一场骑马意外事故导致他瘫痪。

sentences.en: For a moment shock held her immobile.
sentences.cn: 有那么一会儿她惊讶得不能动弹.

sentences.en: Further casualties have been heavy, and we have lost the majority of our immobile guns.
sentences.cn: 又有新的严重的伤亡, 我们固定的大炮多半已经丧失了.

sentences.en: He hesitated for some moments, with a strangely immobile smile upon his face.
sentences.cn: 他犹豫了一会儿, 笑容仿佛凝结在他的脸上.

sentences.en: He stood, immobile, his hands loosely by his sides.
sentences.cn: 他站着, 一动也不动, 两只手垂在两边.

sentences.en: In one instance half a dozen Sikh prisoners were held immobile.
sentences.cn: 有一次,六个锡克人被抓起来捆在那里.

sentences.en: It is possible for labour which is immobile to be harmed by imports.
sentences.cn: 缺乏流动性的劳工可能遭受进口的损害.
它是呆滞的, 不动的, 无表情的.

sentences.en: Joe remained as immobile as if he had been carved out of rock.
sentences.cn: 乔一动不动，仿佛一尊石头雕像。

sentences.en: She could see a figure sitting immobile, facing the sea.
sentences.cn: 她看到一个人影面朝大海坐着，一动不动。

sentences.en: She stood immobile by the window.
sentences.cn: 她一动不动地靠窗站着。

sentences.en: The deer stood immobile among the trees.
sentences.cn: 那只鹿一动不动地站在树丛里.

sentences.en: The dog lay at rest absolutely immobile.
sentences.cn: 那条狗安静地躺着,纹丝不动.

sentences.en: The man remained immobile as before.
sentences.cn: 那人还在那里,安然不动.

sentences.en: These judgments reflected the reality that the Soviet Union was immobile in 1969.
sentences.cn: 这些判断反映了苏联在一九六九年无所作为的现实.

sentences.en: To engage and interlock securely so as to be immobile.
sentences.cn: 使固定紧紧地连结或咬合使其无法移动.

words.tran_cn: 使…不动，使…固定；使…不能调动；使…无机动性
使固定；使不动；使停止流通
